Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Ferdinand
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Ferdinand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Ferdinand.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 50th/Cornell
ShortDescription: SB 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temp. rerouted via  51st, Lake Park, 47th, Lake Shore Dr, 50th, and Hyde Park due to, street blockage at 50th/Cornell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via  51st, Lake Park, 47th, Lake Shore Dr, 50th, and Hyde Park due to, street blockage at 50th/Cornell.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
